_sText:
<object width="480" height="385"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/GGKubVbJoyU?fs=1&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/GGKubVbJoyU?fs=1&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="480" height="385"></embed></object>

V3: Changes:

Added new secret nade (extra hard to get)
made the map brighter ( was quite dark on some pcs)
new Lava texture
Flying part can get bypassed now
some Traps reworked
most traps overall got easier to survive and to predict
Breakable ground at beginning is obvious now
You get healed to 100Hp if you do not use Fly bypass
If Player take Bhop but cant bhop, after 60 seconds teleports to start positions automatic get disabled

Fixed a bug that cause Cts to get stuck after 2. flying part


V2: Changes:

Fire Hud Removed
Bgm Music changed
music start when breaking Musikbox at start
addet 5 new secret nades
some fixes

Music: Terranigma Underworld Theme
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S3mqIDAVObA
VIdeo says more than 1000pics:

deathrun_underworld_fix changes:

fixed Bug where Fire effect do not disappear when new round start while effect on
fixed a bug that made Terrorists unable to chat or do console commands (if other Mapper have this but too pm meee because i experienced this bug on iceworld too)

Meteor Trap Reworked
Spinning Flamewall Kills now instead puting Hp to 1
Energy Vortex is unable to Bypass now
10. Trap firewalls breakable grounds is now visible
to compensate this a breakable ground has been addet at end of map

Some other Optimisations

This is my next map creation:

GET READY FOR HELL

1. Trap: Hyperbeam
2. Trap: Lava Flow
3. Trap: Heat Beam
4. Trap: Door Death
5. Trap: Spike Attac
6. Trap: Dragon Rage
7. Trap: Meteor
8. Trap: Fire Ruby
9. Trap: Plasma Beam
10. Trap: Fire Walls 
11. Trap: Spinning Flamewall
12. Trap: BUTCHER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
13. Trap: Collapsing stones
14. Trap: Emeralt elevator
15. Trap: Energy Vortex (hardest Trap)
16. Trap: Ignite Squares

not all traps are listet there! 

Breaking grounds exist 2 times

4 secret nades:

4minigames:

Bhop
Knive Arena
Awp
Deagle game

and Easy for Noobs

Notes:

Map has background music
And fancy fire animations
3 t spawns
60ct spawns

Both can be turned of if someone dont like (Babys ofc) it by simply killin thos boxes at beginning
This is my last map of this style.

If someone want those Gem models, or some textures pm me or just decompile this map (if posssible) its free to take them as long as you put me into your credits

Have fun
And if you find Bugs Report plz
